title: Guy! Hawaiian Style
overview: Guy Fieri is putting down the grilling tongs and packing up the sunscreen to take viewers on a once-in-a-lifetime journey through Hawaii. Guy! Hawaiian Style, will follow the Food Network star as he and his wife Lori, sons Hunter and Ryder, and nephew Jules embark on a 20-day adventure to Maui, the Big Island of Hawaii, and Oahu.
